And no, they are NOT conspiracy theories, just fact. Exactly like http://www.cooperativeresearch.org/timeline.jsp?timeline=complete_911_timeline&startpos=777

And if american goverment, CIA and military can't answer some of theese questions, then something is definitiv wrong!
So keep em' coming, because then people won't forget.
Regards from Norway

Yes, agreed, they're not conspiracies.. 

However, under dictatorships like the US Government, just asking "questions about things that has not been answered" IS considered to be conspiring.
